hints: Initially, the reward are ranked by {min2}, {min1}, {mid}, {max1}, {max2}
Each reward you receive is the average of all pulls so far, not just your current pull.
Early choices heavily influence subsequent rewards due to the averaging effect.
Favor high-value arms early to establish a good baseline average.
Start with broad exploration, then commit strongly to the best arm found.
If you find a high-value arm, keep choosing it to maintain a strong average reward.
